data.name: Masters of Puzzle - Belfast
data.detailed_description:
We present to you Belfast: a professional high-quality photography provided by our friends from More About Travel*. Check out their blog, a link to which you can find in the community section of the game, for more wonderful pictures and contact information. You won't be disappointed. We hope you'll enjoy this great puzzle box as much as we do.

Content Details

Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle. This puzzle image is smaller in size that most other puzzle boxes we have, but contains a very narrow palette of colors, which will make it very challenging to assemble. You will be able to access this content from within the base game. It will only be downloaded on demand by using the corresponding in-game menus in order to preserve storage space and bandwidth.

* Note: The photography is used by Belleal Games with the explicit permission of More About Travel for the purposes of creating this puzzle box. It remains their property and cannot be copied, shared, or distributed by third parties without their permission.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 42 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min requirements might be subject of a change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 42 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements might be subject of a change
